Lake Tahoe has fallen to an alarmingly low level. Here's what the impact could be

This week, the water level in Lake Tahoe is expected to sink below the basin’s rim, so low that its only outflow, the Truckee River, will soon dry up. It’s not a crisis, researchers say, but it’s not a good sign for the lake’s health.
